channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Verse for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Verse for Android

item.title: CVE-2020-4099|2024-09-17T01:11:32.686Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20verse%20for%20android
item.description: The application was signed using a key length less than or equal to 1024 bits, making it potentially vulnerable to forged digital signatures. An attacker could forge the same digital signature of the app after maliciously modifying the app.
